(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (For 
          (Lhs 
            (Variable 
              (Identifier "i"))) 
          (Do 
            (Statement 
              (MethodCall 
                (ArgumentList 
                  (Arg 
                    (Primary 
                      (Lhs 
                        (Variable 
                          (Identifier "i")))))) 
                (Variable 
                  (Identifier "print"))))) 
          (In 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Array 
                  (Arg 
                    (Primary 
                      (Integer "1"))) 
                  (Arg 
                    (Primary 
                      (Integer "2"))) 
                  (Arg 
                    (Primary 
                      (Integer "3"))))))))))))
